title: Tranquil Bali Beachfront Villas with Daily Breakfast, Daily Free-Flow Cocktail Hour & Massages
description:
Surrounded by lush landscapes and sweeping ocean views, this idyllic seaside resort strikes the perfect balance between relaxation and adventure. Unwind on the unique volcanic sands, enjoy a refreshing dip in your villa’s private pool or sip on delicious cocktails while taking in the breathtaking surroundings.

Tucked away on Bali’s tranquil western coast, this resort is just 90 minutes from Seminyak, yet feels a world apart from the bustling nightlife. For a peaceful retreat, take a leisurely beach stroll to the charming village of Pekutatan, where local culture and authentic experiences await. This serene haven is the ideal place to reconnect and recharge.
offer_address: Jalan Ngurah Rai, Pekutatan, Jembrana, Bali 82262, Indonesia
